tool_description: Parses raw government records from various formats into structured data, extracting key fields and metadata.

raw_records.description: Array of raw record content to parse

source_format.description: Format of input records: xml, json, csv, pdf_text, html, or fixed_width

parsing_schema.description: Specific parsing schema or template to use

extract_fields.description: Specific fields to extract from records

date_format.description: Expected date format in source records

error_messages: Unsupported source_format: Use one of [xml, json, csv, pdf_text, html, fixed_width].
Parsing failed: Unable to parse records with the specified format and schema.
Invalid parsing_schema: The specified schema is not available or malformed.
Field extraction error: One or more specified fields could not be found in the records.
Date format mismatch: Unable to parse dates with the specified or detected format.
usage: Provide raw_records array and source_format. Optionally specify parsing_schema, extract_fields, and date_format for customized parsing. The tool returns structured data extracted from the raw records.

parsed_records.description: Array of structured record data in JSON-like string format

extracted_fields.description: List of field names found and extracted from records

parsing_errors.description: Array of error messages for records that failed parsing
